overview:
Innovative visionary with extensive knowledge of eCommerce and a passion for online marketing. Strong understanding of the current online marketing landscape and long history of online marketing success. Adept negotiator of ad buys with major internet portals (Ask, AOL, Shopping.com, Yahoo, and Lycos). Experience leading a large spectrum of business operations. Respected builder and leader of copywriting/marketing/programming teams; able to assemble, motivate, and retain a quality workforce. Developed and implemented innovative custom software solutions to solve complex business problems. Developed and managed critical partnerships and strategic alliances from large Fortune 500 companies as well as small niche companies.

Aaron Kocourek was the founder of the following companies:

  • TheVacuumCenter.com
  • Vacuums.cc
  • SewingStyle.com
  • SewingMachineSolutions.com
  • VacuumCleanerWarehouse.com

external_links.title: Aaron Kocourek Speaks on Paid Search
